title.rendered: BDSwiss Secures Key Wins at UF Awards LATAM 2024

content.rendered:
BDSwiss was recognized in the categories of “Most Innovative Broker – LATAM” and “Best Research and Education Provider – LATAM” at the recent UF AWARDS LATAM 2024.

These accolades underscore the broker’s strengthening presence in Latin America, an area increasingly crucial for the trading industry due to a rising number of active investors and traders in the retail sector.

The awards were presented at the iFX EXPO LATAM 2024, attended by prominent figures from leading fintech and online trading companies. These achievements underscore BDSwiss’ commitment to innovation, research, and education within the online trading sector.

Alessandro Iacovella, Regional Business Development Team Leader – LATAM at BDSwiss, remarked, “Receiving recognition in these significant categories at the UF AWARDS LATAM is truly an honor. We greatly value the endorsements from our peers in Latin America, which reflect our continuous dedication to providing leading-edge educational and research capabilities, as well as innovative solutions that empower our clients.”

“Our years of research and development have culminated in these products, all aimed at enhancing our service offerings. The interest shown by partners and clients at our expo booth has been very encouraging,” he added.

250 CFDs Across Diverse Platforms
Awarded as the “Most Innovative Broker”, BDSwiss offers a comprehensive trading ecosystem that includes the industry-standard MT4 and MT5 platforms, along with its advanced proprietary web and mobile trading platforms.

The firm provides real-time data on over 250 CFDs across various asset classes such as Forex, stocks, indices, and commodities, complete with interactive charting capabilities. The proprietary mobile app features a user-friendly interface, facilitating easy access and navigation, and allowing traders to swiftly adjust time frames for an optimized trading experience at any time.

With the “Best Research and Education Provider – LATAM” award, BDSwiss has been acknowledged for its extensive educational resources and research tools that support informed trading decisions and help traders enhance their skills and achieve better trading outcomes.
